name: Speedway Heroes
description:
Speedway Heroes is an attempt to fuse the tight physics and deep multiplayer strategy of 'Mario Kart Double Dash' with the endless re-playability and randomly generated levels of 'Spelunky.' Of course there are wacky "carts" like horse and UFO heaped in too.

Speedway Heroes is also an experiment with free, open development. You can grab the latest version for free.

Online is currently deactivated due to lack of players but you can play the single player race to the DMV and sign up for our mailing list here.
